entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9 except minus 2 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9 except minus 2 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 17 except minus 12 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
